backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a readability-enhancement change affecting the WhyILoveYouModal component and related CSS.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend components, styles, and utilities for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining global OKLCH color tokens and dark mode variants.
frontend/index.html: Development-only HTML entrypoint loading /src/main.tsx and warning not to deploy it to production.
frontend/public/_headers: Static hosting header rules defining MIME types and caching policies for assets, HTML, and service worker.
frontend/public/_redirects: SPA routing and security rules blocking /src access, serving assets directly, and falling back to index.html.
frontend/public/404.html: Simple styled 404 error page with link back to home.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling precaching, navigation caching, offline app shell, and proactive bundle caching.
frontend/README.production-deploy.md: Guide explaining how to properly deploy the production Vite build and avoid serving development files.
frontend/scripts/prepare-deploy-artifact: Node script that builds the project, verifies the dist output, and prints deployment instructions.
frontend/scripts/verify-production-artif: Node script that checks a dist folder for a valid production build by validating index.html references and ensuring all assets exist.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component that manages stage transitions, reducedâ€‘motion preference, and service worker registration for the Valentine experience.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorFall: Error boundary component that catches runtime errors, filters known benign ones, and displays a fallback UI with a refresh option.
frontend/src/components/valentine/AudioT: Audio toggle button that uses the audio system to play or mute audio and handle gesture-required playback.
frontend/src/components/valentine/BackBu: Simple back-navigation button for returning to the previous stage.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Backgr: Renders animated background layers, vignette, glow effects, and special visuals for certain stages like star and ending.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Celebr: Celebration stage with animated confetti, heartbeat audio, and timed transitions to show a love meter and proceed forward.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Cursor: Canvas-based sparkle trail that follows the cursor unless reduced motion is enabled.
frontend/src/components/valentine/FinalE: Final screen displaying romantic closing text with animated styling and a promise scroll component.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Heart3: Renders a 3D extruded heart using react-three-fiber with animated rotation and camera zoom. Includes lighting and configurable reduced-motion behavior.
frontend/src/components/valentine/HeartI: Controls an intro animation that zooms into the 3D heart and then fades out before triggering completion. Uses easing and opacity transitions.
frontend/src/components/valentine/HeartY: Animates a deeper zoom into the 3D heart while fading in a text message, then fades out the scene before completing.
frontend/src/components/valentine/LightS: Wraps text with a shimmering light sweep overlay effect using a gradient animation.
frontend/src/components/valentine/LoveMe: Displays an animated progress bar that fills to 100% over time with styled glow effects.
frontend/src/components/valentine/NoButt: Moves a 'No' button away from the cursor by finding safe positions and shows random shayari lines while avoiding nearby elements.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Partic: Draws animated floating heart particles on a canvas with motion and blur, disabled when reduced motion is enabled.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Promis: Provides a swipeable or button-navigated carousel showing a series of romantic promises.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Propos: Renders the main proposal card with animated buttons, including a yes button, a modal trigger, and the evasive no button engine.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Ripple: Button component that renders a temporary ripple effect on click or touch.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Shooti: Displays a message with a timed shooting star animation and calls onComplete after 4 seconds.
frontend/src/components/valentine/StageT: Handles fade transitions between stages by animating opacity when currentStage changes.
frontend/src/components/valentine/StoryS: Cycles through predefined romantic slides every few seconds and triggers onComplete after the last.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Typing: Types two intro lines sequentially, shows a main message, then calls onComplete after delays.
frontend/src/components/valentine/WhyILo: Modal that reveals love lines one by one when opened and allows closing with backdrop or button.
frontend/src/components/valentine/YesCou: Shows countdown lines in sequence and triggers onComplete shortly after the last line.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioSystem.ts: Manages background music, ambient sound, and heartbeat audio with play/pause and gesture handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and context state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook returning an empty query set for this frontend-only app.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base config plus custom OKLCH theme variables and utility classes for glassmorphism, glow effects, and themed light/dark styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/utils/geometry.ts: Provides rectangle geometry helpers and a function to find a non-overlapping safe position for UI elements.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, radius, and enabling plugins like typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, design goals, required features, issues, and architectural notes for the Valentine proposal microsite.
